remarks: A closed box in the product topology.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ptcldmpt.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ptcldmpt.j $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> J e. Top ) $.
ptcldmpt.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) $.
ptcldmpt $p |- ( ph -> X_ k e. A C e. ( Clsd ` ( Xt_ ` ( k e. A |-> J ) ) ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
